00038 using RDK2::RNetObjects::RNetMessage;
00039 
00040 bool RemoteSubscriptionRegister::isIncompleteSub(const RRemoteSubscription* sub)
00041 {
00042     return (sub->socketType == Network::NETPROTOCOL_UNKNOWN
00043         || sub->what == RRemoteSubscription::WHAT_UNKNOWN || sub->when == RRemoteSubscription::WHEN_UNKNOWN
00044         || (sub->when == RRemoteSubscription::PERIODIC && sub->maxPeriod == 0.)
00045         || (sub->when == RRemoteSubscription::ON_CHANGE && sub->minPeriod == 0.));
00046 }
00047 
00048 bool RemoteSubscriptionRegister::completeSub(RRemoteSubscription* sub)
00049 {
00050     bool wasIncomplete = isIncompleteSub(sub);
00051     Property* p = repository->getLocalProperty(sub->completeUrl);
00052     p->lock(HERE);
00053     string propertyClassName = p->getObjectClassName();
00054     RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("PROPERTY CLASS = '%s'", propertyClassName.c_str());
00055     p->unlock();
00056     RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("COMPLETING SUBSCRIPTION: '%s'", sub->getStringForVisualization().c_str());
00057     if (sub->socketType == Network::NETPROTOCOL_UNKNOWN) {
00058         if (propertyClassName == "RImage") sub->socketType = Network::TCP_IP;
00059         else sub->socketType = Network::UDP_IP;
00060     }
00061     if (sub->what == RRemoteSubscription::WHAT_UNKNOWN) {
00062         if (propertyClassName == "RImage") sub->what = RRemoteSubscription::STORAGE_VALUE;
00063         if (sub->socketType == Network::UDP_IP) sub->what = RRemoteSubscription::STORAGE_VALUE;
00064         else sub->what = RRemoteSubscription::STORAGE_DIFFS;
00065     }
00066     if (sub->when == RRemoteSubscription::WHEN_UNKNOWN) {
00067         if (sub->socketType == Network::UDP_IP && sub->what == RRemoteSubscription::STORAGE_VALUE)
00068             sub->when = RRemoteSubscription::PERIODIC;
00069         else if (sub->socketType == Network::UDP_IP && sub->what == RRemoteSubscription::STORAGE_DIFFS)
00070             sub->when = RRemoteSubscription::ON_CHANGE;
00071         else if (sub->socketType == Network::TCP_IP && sub->what == RRemoteSubscription::STORAGE_VALUE)
00072             sub->when = RRemoteSubscription::ON_CHANGE;
00073         else if (sub->socketType == Network::TCP_IP && sub->what == RRemoteSubscription::STORAGE_DIFFS)
00074             sub->when = RRemoteSubscription::PERIODIC;
00075     }
00076     if (sub->when == RRemoteSubscription::PERIODIC && sub->maxPeriod == 0.) {
00077         if (propertyClassName == "RMapImage" || propertyClassName == "RImage") sub->maxPeriod = 2000.;  // XXX
00078         else sub->maxPeriod = 500.;
00079     }
00080     else if (sub->when == RRemoteSubscription::ON_CHANGE && (sub->maxPeriod == 0. || sub->minPeriod == 0.)) {
00081         if (propertyClassName == "RMapImage" || propertyClassName == "RImage") sub->maxPeriod = 2000.;  // XXX
00082         else sub->maxPeriod = 500.;
00083     }
00084     if (propertyClassName == QUEUE_CLASSNAME) {
00085         sub->when = RRemoteSubscription::ON_CHANGE;
00086         sub->what = RRemoteSubscription::QUEUE;
00087         sub->socketType = Network::TCP_IP;
00088     }
00089     if (propertyClassName == "RImage") {
00090         sub->socketType = Network::TCP_IP;  // FIXME it's a hack
00091         sub->maxPeriod = 2000.;
00092         sub->what = RRemoteSubscription::STORAGE_VALUE;
00093         sub->when = RRemoteSubscription::PERIODIC;
00094     }
00095     RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("COMPLETED SUBSCRIPTION: '%s'", sub->getStringForVisualization().c_str());
00096     return wasIncomplete;
00097 }
00098 
00099 bool RemoteSubscriptionRegister::addPropertyToSendSubscription(RRemoteSubscription* sub)
00100 {
00101     bool reallyAdded = false;
00102     if (sub->completeUrl.isComplete()) {
00103         if (isIncompleteSub(sub)) {
00104             DOUT("Received an incomplete subscription: [%s]", sub->getStringForVisualization().c_str());
00105             completeSub(sub);
00106             DOUT("...completed as follows: [%s]", sub->getStringForVisualization().c_str());
00107             repository->queuePush(PROPERTY_OUTBOX,
00108                 new RNetMessage(sub->askingHost, repository->getRepositoryName(),
00109                 RNetMessage::PROPERTY_SUBSCRIPTION, sub->socketType, sub->clone()));
00110         }
00111         myMutex.lock(HERE);
00112         // check if that subscription is already on the database
00113         vector<RRemoteSubscription> q = queryForPropertiesToSend(sub->completeUrl, sub->askingHost, sub->socketType,
00114             sub->what, sub->when);
00115         if (q.size() == 0) {
00116             // if the subscription was not in the database, we add it
00117             sub->id = counter++;
00118             gettimeofday(&sub->timestamp, 0);
00119             DOUT("Adding a new subscription for property to send: [%s]",
00120                 sub->getStringForVisualization().c_str());
00121             propertiesToSend.push_back(sub);
00122             reallyAdded = true;
00123         }
00124         else {
00125             // if the subscription was already in the database, we refresh its timestamp (if it is UDP)
00126             for (vector<RRemoteSubscription>::iterator it = q.begin(); it != q.end(); ++it) {
00127                 if (it->socketType == Network::UDP_IP) {
00128                     DOUT("Refreshing a udp subscription: [%s]",
00129                         (*it)->getStringForVisualization().c_str());
00130                     refreshTimestampL(it->id);
00131                 }
00132             }
00133             delete sub;
00134         }
00135         myMutex.unlock();
00136     }
00137     else {
00138         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Malformed subscription, cannot add [%s]", sub->getStringForVisualization().c_str());
00139         delete sub;
00140     }
00141     return reallyAdded;
00142 }
00143 
00144 void RemoteSubscriptionRegister::completePropertyToReceiveSubscription(RRemoteSubscription* sub)
00145 {
00146     if (sub->completeUrl.isComplete()) {
00147         myMutex.lock(HERE);
00148         for (multimap<Session*, RRemoteSubscription*>::iterator it = propertiesToReceive.begin();
00149         it != propertiesToReceive.end(); ++it) {
00150             if (it->second->id == sub->id) {
00151                 DOUT("Updating an incomplete subscription (from [%s] to [%s])",
00152                     it->second->getStringForVisualization().c_str(),
00153                     sub->getStringForVisualization().c_str());
00154                 delete it->second;
00155                 it->second = sub;
00156                 break;
00157             }
00158         }
00159         myMutex.unlock();
00160     }
00161     else {
00162         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Malformed subscription, cannot add [%s]", sub->getStringForVisualization().c_str());
00163         delete sub;
00164     }
00165 }
00166 
00167 void RemoteSubscriptionRegister::refreshTimestampL(uint id)
00168 {
00169     for (list<RRemoteSubscription*>::iterator it = propertiesToSend.begin(); it != propertiesToSend.end(); ++it) {
00170         if ((*it)->id == id) {
00171             gettimeofday(&(*it)->timestamp, 0);
00172             return;
00173         }
00174     }
00175 }
00176 
00177 void RemoteSubscriptionRegister::refreshLastSendingTimestamp(uint id)
00178 {
00179     for (list<RRemoteSubscription*>::iterator it = propertiesToSend.begin(); it != propertiesToSend.end(); ++it) {
00180         if ((*it)->id == id) {
00181             (*it)->lastSendingTimestamp.setToNow();
00182             return;
00183         }
00184     }
00185 }
00186 
00187 void RemoteSubscriptionRegister::addPropertyToReceiveSubscription(Session* askingSession, RRemoteSubscription* sub)
00188 {
00189     if (!askingSession) {
00190         delete sub;
00191         return;
00192     }
00193 
00194     RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Remote subscribing property '%s' by session %x (%s)", sub->completeUrl.c_str(),
00195         askingSession, askingSession->getSessionName().c_str());
00196 
00197     if (sub->completeUrl.isComplete()) {
00198         myMutex.lock(HERE);
00199         vector<RRemoteSubscription> q =
00200             queryForPropertiesToReceive(sub->completeUrl, sub->askingHost, sub->socketType, sub->what, sub->when);
00201         if (q.empty()) {
00202             sub->id = counter++;
00203             DOUT("New property to receive (subscription: [%s])", sub->getStringForVisualization().c_str());
00204             propertiesToReceive.insert(make_pair(askingSession, sub));
00205         }
00206         else delete sub;
00207         myMutex.unlock();
00208     }
00209     else {
00210         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Malformed subscription, cannot add [%s]", sub->getStringForVisualization().c_str());
00211     }
00212 }
00213 
00214 void RemoteSubscriptionRegister::deleteAllSubscriptionsOfSession(Session* session)
00215 {
00216     myMutex.lock(HERE);
00217     bool somethingDeleted = false;
00218     do {
00219         somethingDeleted = false;
00220         for (multimap<Session*, RRemoteSubscription*>::iterator it = propertiesToReceive.begin();
00221         it != propertiesToReceive.end(); ++it) {
00222             if (it->first == session) {
00223                 DOUT("Deleting subscription [%s] of session %x", it->second->getStringForVisualization(),
00224                     it->first);
00225                 delete it->second;
00226                 propertiesToReceive.erase(it);
00227                 somethingDeleted = true;
00228                 break;
00229             }
00230         }
00231     } while (somethingDeleted);
00232     myMutex.unlock();
00233 }
00234 
00235 void RemoteSubscriptionRegister::deleteSubscriptionToSend(uint id)
00236 {
00237     myMutex.lock(HERE);
00238     list<RRemoteSubscription*>& subs = propertiesToSend;
00239     for (list<RRemoteSubscription*>::iterator it = subs.begin(); it != subs.end(); ++it) {
00240         if (id == (*it)->id) {
00241             delete *it;
00242             subs.erase(it);
00243             break;
00244         }
00245     }
00246     myMutex.unlock();
00247 }
00248 
00249 vector<RRemoteSubscription> RemoteSubscriptionRegister::queryForPropertiesToSend(Url completeUrl,
00250     string askingHost, Network::NetProtocol socketType,
00251     RRemoteSubscription::What what, RRemoteSubscription::When when)
00252 {
00253     vector<RRemoteSubscription> res;
00254     list<RRemoteSubscription*>& subs = propertiesToSend;
00255     for (list<RRemoteSubscription*>::iterator it = subs.begin(); it != subs.end(); ++it) {
00256         RRemoteSubscription* s = *it;
00257         bool select = true;
00258         if (askingHost != "" && askingHost != s->askingHost) select = false;
00259         if (socketType != Network::NETPROTOCOL_ANY && socketType != s->socketType) select = false;
00260         if (what != RRemoteSubscription::WHAT_ANY && what != s->what) select = false;
00261         if (when != RRemoteSubscription::WHEN_ANY && when != s->when) select = false;
00262         if (completeUrl != "" && completeUrl != s->completeUrl) select = false;
00263         if (select) res.push_back(*s);  // the default copy constructor does what it has to do
00264     }
00265     return res;
00266 }
00267 
00268 vector<RRemoteSubscription> RemoteSubscriptionRegister::queryForPropertiesToReceive(Url completeUrl,
00269     string askingHost, Network::NetProtocol socketType,
00270     RRemoteSubscription::What what, RRemoteSubscription::When when)
00271 {
00272     vector<RRemoteSubscription> res;
00273     multimap<Session*, RRemoteSubscription*>& subs = propertiesToReceive;
00274     DOUT("Looking for %s, %s, %d %d %d", completeUrl.c_str(), askingHost.c_str(), socketType, what, when);
00275     for (multimap<Session*, RRemoteSubscription*>::iterator it = subs.begin(); it != subs.end(); ++it) {
00276         RRemoteSubscription* s = it->second;
00277         DOUT("Subscription %s", s->getStringForVisualization().c_str());
00278         bool select = true;
00279         if (askingHost != "" && askingHost != s->askingHost) select = false;
00280         if (socketType != Network::NETPROTOCOL_ANY && socketType != s->socketType) select = false;
00281         if (what != RRemoteSubscription::WHAT_ANY && what != s->what) select = false;
00282         if (when != RRemoteSubscription::WHEN_ANY && when != s->when) select = false;
00283         if (completeUrl != "" && completeUrl != s->completeUrl) select = false;
00284         if (select) res.push_back(*s);  // the default copy constructor does what it has to do
00285     }
00286     return res;
00287 }
